properties.Observatio: There are  apala trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams, and in some places, reserved lands are being misused.
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-to prevent bank erosion

Vegetative?cover?is improving along the river bank,  2m width and 2km length with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/?Mee/?Godapara/ kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mi
